0_SS_TAIKA
After mysteriously vanishing during the fierce battle with Diabolos, a swirl of dark energy materialized near the scarred battleground. From its shadowy depths, Taika reappeared, as if summoned by some arcane force. He lay sprawled on the ground, weakened but alive, his chest rising faintly with each breath.

His comrades erupted in joy at the sight of their commander’s return, their cheers echoing across the desolate field. Yet, as they rushed to his side, a subtle unease crept over them. Something was... off. Taika’s face was a blank mask, his eyes vacant, devoid of the fire that once defined him. He spoke no words, his silence chilling, as though his mind had been hollowed out.

Unseen by his companions, a sinister shadow loomed behind Taika. Its dark, ethereal wings curled around him in a possessive embrace, an invisible puppeteer weaving its will through his lifeless form. The figure’s presence whispered of control, its grip tightening over the commander’s soul, unnoticed by those who celebrated his return.
